reviewText: Watch this one with a box of kleenext. It's hard to find clean fulfilling movies. This is the one to watch!
Title: Clover

reviewText: This touching film is a beautiful story and I recommend it to all. Elizabeth McGovern was perfectly cast in this role. It is one of my favorite movies.
Title: Clover

reviewText: Great flick ! Southern to the max. Not about black and white but about family! Elizabeth McGovern should have won an academy award. Ernie Hudson give a perfect performance.  The writer Dori Sanders did a great job on Clover! Good family flick
Title: Clover

reviewText: I enjoyed it very much.It is about issues faced many places.Only thing was I do not believe in ghosts coming back into our lives.
Title: Clover

reviewText: although it wasn't mine, I enjoyed watching it with my mother. she was beyond pleased with it; she had been searching for it for awhile.
Title: Clover
